==== yieldExpressionInnerCommentEmit.ts (1 errors) ====
    function * foo2() {
        /*comment1*/ yield 1;
        yield /*comment2*/ 2;
        yield 3 /*comment3*/
        yield */*comment4*/ [4];
                            ~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '{}' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
        yield /*comment5*/* [5];
    }
